entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improving type-safety of RazorComponentResult<T> #51923
  • Static Web Assets Compression Flag Breaking Change #51922
  • Dotnet watch run broken with arguments #51921
  • Published size improvement: basicminimalapivanilla #51920
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plaintext #51919
  • Add a simple TooManyRequestsResult to provided action object results #51915
  • ASP.NET Core Web App (Model-View-Controller) targeting .NET 8 with Windows Identity Platform fails after user login #51913
  • Add option to disable form field as CSRF token source from `AntiforgeryOptions` #51912
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcvanilla #51908

Closed

  • Blazor WASM: Button-tag is not correctly disabled within a disabled fieldset #34749
    Planning: WebUI
  • PageTitle not working in Auth default template page #51739
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #51899
  • CodeSpace fails to build Dotnet #51848
  • get InvalidCastException when I use [Inject]IAccessTokenProvider #51699

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.1 #51918
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update branding to 7.0.15 #51917
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.26 #51916
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51811
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Update build docs and AspNetCore.sln #51900
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update SDK to 23556.1 #51907
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Fix construction of AsParameters with default constructor #51637
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0.x
  • Use working directory as relative directory for project file resolution #51762
    area-commandlinetools, pending-ci-rerun
  • SignalR transport has unexpected behaviour about transport when calling withUrl() twice #51875
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Fix duplicate add of items to Compile on Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client.targets #51846
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with action replacement #51880
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, analyzer, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with switch #51881
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md #51728
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
